main.intro: The aim of this application is to create simple relational data models and to save them in json files.
This help is contextual: click on it to get information about the interface.
Create a data table using this button.
Interact with your model in this frame. You can export the image in a png file by right clicking on it and choosing "Save image as...".
When you've finished your model, click on this button and the application will return the model as a RelDataModel object.
Export your model as a json file or in a html interactive graph.
Import a model from already saved in a json file. You can also import simple sql files generated by MySQL Workbench.
Select all tables in your model.
Fit the model in the frame.

tables.intro: Select the color of the table.

twoTables.intro: Add a foreign key between the two tables.

oneTable.intro: Add a self referencing foreign key.
Change the name of the table. The model will be adapted automatically.
Add or change a description of the table.

withFields.intro: Select a row to edit a field.

withIndexes.intro: Select a row to edit the index.
